message: Let's get started! I'll give you a fair share, but I'm not going to get ripped off!
Let's be fair, Alice.  I'm willing to split the money evenly.  This way, we both get a good share and we can avoid the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle and we can end this!
Alice, we're both losing money with each round. Let's compromise. I'll give you a slight advantage, but we can both get a better share than we would if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
